page.title: 02Headlines mid'85
page.content:
SPORT:{EVERTON FC:}league champions / win Cup Winners Cup in Rotterdam/ beat Liverpool for third time this season. {L'POOL FC:} play European Final after tragic disaster in stadium /{OLYMPICS: Current Manchester bid for 1992 Games would exclude Liverpool entirely. {GRAND NATIONAL:} Last Suspect at 50-1.
BUILDING:{ INNER CITY}modernization & rebuilding continues /{ EVERTON PARK nears completion /{EVERTON and WALTON {HALL PARK }sports complexes extended.
TRAVEL:{LIME ST STATION}modernization completed/{ISLE OF MAN}ferry withdrawn
GENERAL:{ COUNCIL} set deficit budget in defiance of Govt./{FESTIVAL GARDENS open following 1984 International Fest {DRUGS:} problem grows: much concern. {BEATLE CITY}financial problem reported
